attributes.action: Buying and selling. Make it like Scotland if you make an offer you buy it.
attributes.additional_details:
Making it like the law in Scotland. if you make an offer you have to buy it. 

No pulling out last minute.
attributes.background: It’s taken almost 3 months to get to the point where just about to exchange contracts and the buyers have pulled out. Putting our life in turmoil.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323521.
